amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the importance of civics and government education.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 900 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 900 proposed by Senator Cardin. (consideration: CR S1966-1967; text: CR S1967) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the importance of civics and government education.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 900 proposed by Senator Cardin.
